caption.p: Chaetic Sensilla Type 2 (CS2). ( A) SEM dorsal view of a CS2 showing the distal part divided into two pointed branches. ( B, C) TEM micrographs showing cross section of an CS2 taken at the level of the dotted lines reported in A. In both cases the sensillum shows a thick and compact cuticle and the absence of sensory neurons entering the sensillum. Bar scale: ( A) 5 µm; ( B, C) 1 µm.
